title: Bengal Woman Designs Dress For Queen Camilla, Accessory For King Charles
desc: A woman fashion designer from a village in West Bengal's Hooghly district has designed a dress for British Queen Camilla and a brooch for King Charles III and received a letter from the Royal family thanking her.

title: After 8 Decades, Woman, Now 93, Wins Court Battle For South Mumbai Flats
desc: The Bombay High Court has directed the Maharashtra government to hand over two south Mumbai flats to their owner, a 93-year-old woman, putting an end to a property dispute that dragged on for eight decades.

title: Scorpion Bites Woman On Air India Nagpur-Mumbai Flight: Report
desc: In a rare incident, a woman passenger was bitten by a scorpion onboard an Air India flight from Nagpur to Mumbai last month.

title: "Beware Of Spurious Promise Of...": P Chidambaram Warns Karnataka Voters
desc: Senior Congress leader P Chidambaram on Saturday referred to the violence in Manipur to say that Karnataka voters should beware of the "spurious promise of a double-engine government".

title: More Than 1,100 People from Violence-Hit Manipur Enter Assam
desc: More than 1,100 people from Manipur's Jiribam district and surrounding areas have crossed the inter-state border to enter Assam's Cachar district, following violence in the neighbouring state, officials said on Saturday.

title: Army Grounds 'Dhruv' Chopper Fleet After J&K Crash That Killed 1: Sources
desc: Two days after a chopper hard landing in Jammu and Kashmir's Kishtwar killed a technician and injured two pilots, the Indian Army has grounded its fleet of indigenous Advanced Light Helicopter (ALH) 'Dhruv' as per procedure, sources said.

title: Lashkar Terrorist Killed In Encounter With Army In J&K's Baramulla
desc: A Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) militant was killed in an encounter with security forces in Baramulla district of Jammu and Kashmir on Saturday, police said.

title: Rajnath Singh's Jammu Visit Day After 5 Soldiers Killed In Rajouri
desc: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh will visit Jammu and Kashmir's Rajouri today where five Army personnel were killed and one major-rank officer was wounded in a blast triggered by terrorists.

title: Odisha Government Asks Coastal Districts To Be Ready Amid Cyclone Forecast
desc: The Odisha government has asked the Collectors of 18 coastal and adjoining districts to be prepared for any eventuality in view of the forecast of a cyclonic storm.

title: These Indians Will Attend King Charles' Coronation In London Today
desc: Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar, who will officially represent India, reached London yesterday along with his wife Sudesh Dhankhar for the star-studded royal extravaganza.

title: "Homosexuality A Disorder, Will Rise If...": RSS Body Survey
desc: Many doctors and allied medical professionals believe homosexuality is "a disorder" and it will increase further in society if same-sex marriage is legalised, according to a survey by Samwardhini Nyas, an affiliate of the women's wing of the RSS.

title: 2 Terrorists Killed In Separate Encounters In Jammu And Kashmir
desc: A fresh encounter started in Kandi forest area of Jammu and Kashmir's Rajouri district today where five special forces soldiers were killed on Friday.

title: Teachers Recruitment Scam: Probe Agency CBI Conducts Searches In Bengal
desc: The CBI has conducted searches in West Bengal in connection with the primary teachers recruitment scam case at the premises of aides of former education minister Partha Chatterjee, officials said on Friday.

title: "A True Champion Has Made Proud Again": Anurag Thakur Lauds Neeraj Chopra
desc: Union Minister of Youth Affairs and Sports Anurag Thakur lauded Neeraj Chopra after the Tokyo Olympic gold medallist claimed the Doha Diamond League 2023.

title: Defence Sector Was Like A "Club" For Congress To "Plunder Nation": PM Modi
desc: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday took a swipe at Congress leaders, who allegedly tried to mislead employees of Hindustan Aeronautics Limited employees a few years ago when the Indian Army was deployed on the border.

title: Organisations That Spread Hatred Should Be Banned: Akhilesh Yadav
desc: Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav on Friday said organisations that spread hatred in the country and society should be banned.

title: King Charles And His Love For Indian Music, Art And Food
desc: King Charles III, all set to be crowned as UK's monarch today, is believed to have a special link with India. Having visited India 10 times, India and King Charles III go a long way back.

title: Statements Of 7 Women Wrestlers Against Wrestling Body Chief Recorded
desc: Delhi Police recorded the statements of seven women wrestlers in connection with the cases registered against Wrestling Federation of India chief Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh, officials said on Friday.

title: Indian-American Neera Tanden To Serve As Biden's Domestic Policy Adviser
desc: US President Joe Biden on Friday announced that Indian-American Neera Tanden will serve as the next head of his domestic policy council, replacing outgoing adviser Susan Rice.

title: 17 Air Force Flights, 5 Navy Ship Sorties Rescue 3,862 Indians From Sudan
desc: India on Friday wrapped up 'Operation Kaveri', launched to rescue its nationals stranded in crisis-hit Sudan, with the transport aircraft of the Indian Air Force making its final flight to bring 47 passengers home.
